definition: to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

pinyin: mei2 ti3 jie1 kou3 lian2 jie1 qi4
shu4 ju4 lian4 lu4 lian2 jie1 biao1 zhi4

sentences.english: The recipient will be left with multiple half-open connections that are occupying limited resources.
sentences.chinese: 收件人将留下多个半开连接占用有限的资源。

sentences.english: She clicks on the link to the registration form and begins entering her information.
sentences.chinese: 她在登记表的连接处点击一下，开始进入她的信息。

sentences.english: Mr. Kallasvuo said maps and navigation will be at the heart of the company's connection services.
sentences.chinese: 康培凯说，地图和导航将是公司连接服务的核心。

sentences.english: The connection can still be used, just with heightened security in mind.
sentences.chinese: 连接仍然可用，只是需要从思想上提高安全意识。

sentences.english: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bzier curves to the current figure.
sentences.chinese: 在当前图形中添加一系列相互连接的立方贝塞尔曲线。

sentences.english: Weights shown for ball valve figures are PVC threaded models.
sentences.chinese: 表中所显示的重量适用于PVC螺纹连接的球阀。

sentences.english: Check ring joint (CRJ) structure was utilized in USPG.
sentences.chinese: 卡环式连接结构被应用于水下夹桩器。

sentences.english: The crew vehicle and the lander will then link up and fly off to the moon.
sentences.chinese: 然后载人飞行器和着陆器将连接到一起，并飞向月球。

sentences.english: We need physical access to a computer with a keyboard hooked directly to it.
sentences.chinese: 需要用直接连接到计算机上的键盘来物理访问计算机。

sentences.english: The grounding wires can be fixed on case body and case door. The connecting parts can be detached.
sentences.chinese: 箱体和箱门上都可安装接地线，连接件可以卸下。

sentences.english: Variable capacitor soldering joints made with RG213 coaxial braid.
sentences.chinese: 可变电容器的焊点与RG213同轴电缆编织的连接。

sentences.english: The backplane eliminates the necessity of wiring the card outputs together externally.
sentences.chinese: 采用背板的方式无需在外部通过接线连接插卡的输出。

sentences.english: Where was the device that connected charge and magnetic flux?
sentences.chinese: 连接电荷和磁通量的元件在哪里？

sentences.english: This introduces the idea of a trusted connection.
sentences.chinese: 这就引出了受信任连接的思想。

sentences.english: It was a stopping point on the famous Silk Road between the East and the West .
sentences.chinese: 当时它是连接东西方的著名丝绸之路上的一个歇脚点。

sentences.english: Typically, the modem is connected to one of the serial ports on the computer.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，数据机会连接至电脑上的其中一个序列埠。

definition: variant of 連接|连接[lian2 jie1]
to open access/to establish contact/to remove a block/to put through (a phone connection)
to access (a network)/to insert (a plug) into (a socket)
to access/to transfer passengers between two railway lines
